We are young and ambitious startup in the field of AI and Data Science looking for a  join our team. We are active in the area of web mining and Language Processing. Are you up for the challenge?Â 

Responsibilities:Â 
Â â€¢ Be able to process and integrate disparate data from different data sources

Requirements:

What we offer:
